TopicTitle: Historical and Real Spacecraft in Realism Overhaul

Articles.Content:
I've done my bit of hunting, but searching this forum is notoriously difficult. What IRL spacecraft mods have support or a config for Realism Overhaul? Im trying to go as real as really possible and was hoping a few of some of the great mods also exist at Realism Overhaul scale, with all the bells and whistles involved.

I would really appreciate being pointed in the right direction, thanks!
Everything supported should be in the RO opening post...

Everything supported should be in the RO opening post...

I think you'll agree that the forums aren't the most organized place, and MM configs made by third parties might be out there that I haven't caught. I did read the opening post and noted a lot of the packs are WIP, I was wondering if maybe these had threads dedicated to them, perhaps
I dig quite deeply through the forums every day, and there really haven't been much in the way of extra config patches--not least because whenever there are, we ask to include them in RO.
